Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.base

Interface TableField<T>

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface TableField<T>
Represents a field in a table row that can be dynamically accessed and modified. This functional interface allows for invoking a setter method on a given instance to set a value for a specific table column.

Primarily used for reading, writing, and updating table data within the Table and TableService implementations.

The row model type is represented by T, which defines the structure of a table row. The type P represents the field type being set within the table row model.

    Creates a TableField from a given BiConsumer, which represents a setter method for a specific field.

  • Method Details

    • of

      static <T, P> TableField<T> of(BiConsumer<T,P> consumer)
      Creates a TableField from a given BiConsumer, which represents a setter method for a specific field.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the row model.
      P - The type of the field being set.
      Parameters:
      consumer - The setter method reference.
      Returns:
      A TableField instance.

    • invoke

      void invoke(T instance, Object o) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException
      Invokes the setter method for the corresponding field in the provided instance.
      Parameters:
      instance - The object instance on which to set the field value.
      o - The value to be set.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - If the method is not accessible.
      InvocationTargetException - If the method invocation fails.
